decision_conditions: The applicant has demonstrated, on the balance of probability, that the operations described in the First Schedule of this notice"Use of the site as a school falling within Use Class F1(a) of Schedule 2 Part B of the The Town and Country Planning(Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) for no more than 278 pupils/children aged 4-11 not in compliance with condition 3 of Planning Permission MAL 1316 dated 14/03/1952" has taken place for a continuous period of 10 years.
